SQL.LOAD: SELECT trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, xml_mfg_part_code, xml_part_description_code, xml_part_cost, xml_part_defect, xml_part_solution, xml_in_stock, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, trans_dtl_part_id FROM elp_trans_dtl_part WHERE trans_dtl_part_id = :trans_dtl_part_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_trans_dtl_part SET trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id = :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, xml_mfg_part_code = :xml_mfg_part_code, xml_part_description_code = :xml_part_description_code, xml_part_cost = :xml_part_cost, xml_part_defect = :xml_part_defect, xml_part_solution = :xml_part_solution, xml_in_stock = :xml_in_stock, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE trans_dtl_part_id = :trans_dtl_part_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_trans_dtl_part ( trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, xml_mfg_part_code, xml_part_description_code, xml_part_cost, xml_part_defect, xml_part_solution, xml_in_stock, created_by, trans_dtl_part_id ) VALUES ( :trans_dtl_clm_updte_2elita_id, :xml_mfg_part_code, :xml_part_description_code, :xml_part_cost, :xml_part_defect, :xml_part_solution, :xml_in_stock, :created_by, :trans_dtl_part_id )
